articles.title: Test distill datatable
articles.contents:
This is a minimum
reproducible example
Here’s a
discussion of the problem I’ve observed.
demo trivial plot



demo datatable

demo datatable inside a
details section
With Safari on a Mac, you can only see the data table if you press
Option-Command-i – two times!
With Firefox on a Mac, you can only see the data table if you press
Option-Command-i – two times!
With Firefox on a PC, you can only see the data table if you press
Control-Shift-i – two times!

A minimum reproducible
example.
To demonstrate a distill / datatable interaction issue that’s
dicussed here
and demonstrated here.
